name: Hypnotic Lights #1
description:
This is the first piece in my small series of mesmerising, animated light shows that I've created. 

I took the original photograph back in 2011 and I've always loved it! However, it's never really fitted in with my usual photography of nature, wildlife and landscapes. I didn't think it would ever see the light of day again... until I entered the NFT world! 

After being inspired by so many amazing artists in the NFT community, I pushed myself out of my comfort zone, got creative, and am now able to share some of my rare works with you! 

5 editions

1080p
